Public Attributes

const char * location
 The location that the exception occurred, typically a fully qualified class::method() name, optionally with parameters.
const char * message
 A message customized to the specific exception event, generally used to provided details on invalid parameters or unexpected values.
const char * name
 The name of the exception, generally the same as the struct or class name.

Detailed Description

Provides a base exception class that accepts an exception name, location, and message.
